column2: we were content but not stuffed. But our palates were fairly saturated from the onslaught of colorful and savory courses. The simple and refreshing summery strawberry-apricot sorbet with a crunchy butter crumble really hit the spot. The final throw-in was a savory miso-pecan bread pudding
column3: which soaks overnight and goes in the oven for 20 minutes before getting the maple caramel sauce treatment. Crazy decadent and maybe could've used more sweet and less savory
